T01rahppspu:3: yā tvaṃ sarvānavadyāṅgi niravadyair nirīkṣyase // RahPps_1 //
T01rahppspu:5: yas tvāṃ paśyati bhāvena sa paśyati tathāgatam // RahPps_2 //
T01rahppspu:6: tava cārye guṇāḍhyāyā buddhasya ca jagadguroḥ /
T01rahppspu:7: na paśyanty antaraṃ santaś candracandrikayor iva // RahPps_3 //
T01rahppspu:10: sakṛd apy āśaye śuddhe yas tvāṃ vidhivad īkṣate /
T01rahppspu:13: poṣikā janayitrī ca mātā tvam asi vatsalā // RahPps_6 //
T01rahppspu:14: yad buddhā lokaguravaḥ putrās tava kṛpālavaḥ /
T01rahppspu:15: tena tvam api kalyāṇi sarvasattvapitāmahī // RahPps_7 //
T01rahppspu:18: vineyaṃ janam āsādya tatra tatra tathāgataiḥ /
T01rahppspu:19: bahurūpā tvam evaikā nānānāmabhir īḍyase // RahPps_9 //
T01rahppspu:21: tvāṃ prāpya pralayaṃ yānti doṣā vādāś ca vādinām // RahPps_10 //
T01rahppspu:24: yasya tvayy apy abhiṣvaṅgas tvannāthasya na vidyate /
T01rahppspu:25: tasyāmba katham anyatra rāgadveṣau bhaviṣyataḥ // RahPps_12 //
T01rahppspu:26: nāgacchasi kutaś cit tvaṃ na ca kva cana gacchasi /
T01rahppspu:27: sthāneṣv api ca sarveṣu vidvadbhir nopalabhyase // RahPps_13 //
T01rahppspu:28: ye tvām evaṃ na paśyanti prapadyante ca bhāvataḥ /
T01rahppspu:29: prapadya ca vimucyante tad idaṃ mahad adbhutam // RahPps_14 //
T01rahppspu:30: tvām eva badhyate paśyann apaśyann api badhyate /
T01rahppspu:31: tvām eva mucyate paśyann apaśyann api mucyate // RahPps_15 //
T01rahppspu:33: sudurbodhāsi māyeva dṛśyase na ca dṛśyase // RahPps_16 //
T01rahppspu:34: buddhaiḥ pratyekabuddhaiś ca śrāvakaiś ca niṣevitā /
T01rahppspu:35: mārgas tvam ekā mokṣasya nāsty anya iti niścayaḥ // RahPps_17 //
T01rahppspu:37: kṛpayā lokanāthais tvam ucyase ca na cocyase // RahPps_18 //
T01rahppspu:38: śaktaḥ kas tvām iha stotuṃ nirnimittāṃ nirañjanām /
T01rahppspu:39: sarvavāgviśayātītāṃ yā tvaṃ kva cid aniśritā // RahPps_19 //
T01rahppspu:40: saty evam api saṃvṛtyā vākpathair vayam īdṛśaiḥ /
T01rahppspu:41: tvām astutyām api satīṃ tuṣṭūṣantaḥ sunirvṛtāḥ // RahPps_20 //
T01rahppspu:43: tenāstv āśu jagat kṛtsnaṃ prajñāpāraparāyaṇam // RahPps_21 //
